sections.title: Spirit Channeler Emissary (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Spirit Channeler Emissary class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Spirit Animal (Ex) (Spirit Channeler Emissary)
sections.description: Enhances familiars or spirit animals by granting shaman spirit abilities to non-spirit familiars, or evolution points and eidolon evolutions to existing spirit animals.

sections.title: Spirit Bond (Su) (Spirit Channeler Emissary)
sections.description: Creates a powerful bond with a specific spirit, stacking Spirit Channeler emissary levels with shaman levels for spirit abilities, hexes, and spirit magic.

sections.title: Sixth Sense (Sp) (Spirit Channeler Emissary)
sections.description: Grants detect undead as a spell-like ability that expands to detect fey at 2nd level and outsiders at 3rd level, requiring concentration to distinguish aura types.

sections.title: Animus (Sp) (Spirit Channeler Emissary)
sections.description: Summons creatures using the spirit animal as a conduit, functioning as summon monster IV with the summoned creature replacing and gaining the spirit animal's abilities temporarily.

sections.title: Manifest Will (Su) (Spirit Channeler Emissary)
sections.description: Allows substituting Wisdom modifier for a chosen physical ability modifier on checks as an immediate action, expanding to more ability scores as levels increase.

sections.title: Parley (Sp) (Spirit Channeler Emissary)
sections.description: Grants calm spirit as a spell-like ability three times per day, expanding to affect undead, outsiders, and fey as levels increase.

sections.title: Spirit Conduit (Su) (Spirit Channeler Emissary)
sections.description: Enhances animus summons with Augment Summoning bonuses, allows repositioning the spirit animal when animus vanishes, and grants commune-like questions at higher levels.
